transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji. Haan dijiye usme message.
Customer: Good evening. Very good evening. Free ho gaye aap?
Executive: Bole. Haan boliye.
Executive: Priyanka baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART associate se Jain sir. Aapse discussion hua tha na aapne bola tha 10 to 15 minutes baad connect karega.
Customer: Haan haan haan haan.
Executive: To abhi aap free ho gaye na sir?
Customer: Haan mam boliye na.
Executive: Sir main aapse ye request kar rahi thi jaise aapke jo products hai aap cattle feed mein bhi deal kar rahe hain cattle feed?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Jaise aap cotton seed ke cotton seed oil cake aur oil cake mein deal kar rahe ho.
Customer: Haan wohi hai ek hi mam.
Executive: Achha ek hai. But sir cattle feed jo category hai woh aapke product mein add nahi hai. To agar cattle feed ke naam se aap koi product add karenge to woh uska benefit aapko aur bhi milega ki aapke paas aur aur relevant inquiries aur call aayengi. Kyunki cattle feed ke naam se aapne koi product nahi add kar rakha hai.
Customer: Abhi meri baat suniye mam dekhiye cattle feed mein alag alag types aate hain. Main usme se khali ek hi isme deal kar raha cotton seed cake jisko English mein cotton seed oil cake bolte hain aur Hindi aur Marathi mein jo bhi apne local local language hai usme alag alag naam se pehchan jate hain jaise sarki dep, sarki pind, kapasi kalli, binola kal aise.
Customer: Aur maine cattle feed liya na mam to mere ko alag alag product ke leads aa rahi isliye maine hatwaya tha.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aapko kya leads aati hai sir cattle feed mein?
Customer: Cattle feed mein alag alag aati mam cattle feed mein bahut sare types hai mam product ke. Isme se main khali isme hi deal kar raha cotton seed cake mein.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Haan. Jaise cattle feed pashu aahar mein aata hai. Theek hai? Nahi mam waise nahi aayega.
Executive: Mam nahi mam woh alag product mein aata hai jisko hum cattle feed bolte hain usme deal kar rahe ho aap?
Customer: Yes mam wohi to hai matlab jo cows buffalo khate hain na. Main main wohi hai nahi wohi hai na jaise gobar ke uple ek tarah se isme bola jaye to.
Customer: Chalo hai 100 rupay. 50 Jagdish bhai 50 packet hai. De dena. Haan boliye mam.
Executive: Haan ji normally agar main ek normal bhasha mein baat karu to jaise gobar ke unko hi cattle feed bolte hain usi mein deal kar rahe ho na sir aap?
Customer: Theek hai aap apna. Okay theek hai. Baki mujhe aapse ek cheez aur discuss karni hai main aapse discuss kar leti hu. Abhi maine ek product aapka cattle feed ka add kara hai kyuki aapke catalog mein cattle feed se koi product nahi add tha. Cattle seed oil cake tha cotton seed oil cake tha ye sara kuch pada tha but cattle feed jo aap keh rahe ho jaise aap deal kar rahe ho theek hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Woh woh added woh woh added nahi tha.
Customer: Okay. Haan aur aap specifically local aapki preference local hai aap local mein hi deal karte hain?
Customer: Mam isme kya hai dekhiye idhar customer hai na mere ko 10 bag 50 bag bolte online lekin woh transport mein bahut cost lagta hai to main minimum 10 tan ka deta hu matlab approx 200 bag deta hu main minimum.
Executive: Minimum 10 tan mein deal karte ho aap ye keh rahe ho?
Customer: Haan aur local mein raha mere district mein raha to main 50 bag bhi dene ke liye tayar hu.
Executive: Achha. Haan lekin jo bahar ka customer hai jo dur hai mere se minimum matlab 100 kilometer se jyada dur hai to usko main 10 tan deta hu minimum.
Executive: Okay koi baat nahi aap jaise bhi dete ho aap jaise aapne lead uthai hai 18 November ko aapne Shatanya ke lead uthai hai Navi Mumbai se 6 lakh se 8 lakh order value ki. To isse aapka kya discussion hua unse mam se?
Customer: Mam abhi woh to bolne mein bol raha ki main daily 20 30 tan ka maal sell karta hu lekin uske baad mein call bhi nahi aaya maine kiya to usne uthaya nahi. To aise hi bol raha genuine nahi mujhe mere ko. Aap unhe WhatsApp pe connect karke details discuss kar sakte ho kyuki generally jo aap lead utha rahe ho woh bulk ke hi leads utha rahe ho right sir? Ha ha.
Executive: Main dekh pa rahi thi. But mera aapse ek suggestion hoga jaise aap recent by lead consumption aapki preference jo hai woh local hai ki aap sabse jyada Maharashtra prefer kar rahe ho Pune, Mumbai, Nasik, Jalaun, Aurangabad jo aapka local hai theek hai? Hmm. To mera aapse ek request hoga dekhiye maturity aapko milegi jab aapko ek mahine pehle mil rahi thi to abhi bhi milegi. But mera aapse request hoga ki jyada se jyada leads aap un clients ki uthao jo clients aapko one year old dikh raha ho jo client mobile email business name business address sab par active ho jahan pe clients ne in detail discussion dala ho. Ab koi client hai woh ek mahine pehle aaya hai theek hai aapne by lead section pe aa gaye maine India select karke recent pe click kiya mujhe do minute purani ek lead dikh rahi hai cotton seed cake mein 10 tan ki from Telangana location theek hai ab ye client do saal se IndiaMART pe hai to main ek chance usko le sakti hu consume karne ka lekin jo client sirf ek mahine pehle aaya aur mobile par active hai usne apni details bhi proper nahi dali hai to aise clients ko hum consume nahi karenge. Aap samajh rahe hain? Kyunki waha par aapki maturity ke chances kam ho jate hain theek hai? Aapne isse pehle do deal uthai hai woh aapke regular client hai sir aap?
Customer: Haan. Aapke woh regular client to meri pehle hui thi mam nahi mam unhone bhi ek hi bar liya uske baad me unhone connect hi nahi kiya baad mein. Achha nahi aap connect bhi kar sakte ho maybe clients kuch regular bhi ban jate hain sir. 15 users ne aapko rate kiya hai to maybe shayad aapki maturity ho rahi hogi kyuki clients aapke products ki images dal ke aapko rate kar rahe hain to waha pe aapki maturity ho bhi rahi hogi. Mera aapse bas ek kehna hai ki aap chahte ho aapki maturity aur ho ya fir jo abhi nahi hoti hai woh ho uske liye aapka selection of by leads important hai. Aap recent leads ko consume karo aap jo leads consume kar rahe ho mostly leads aap woh consume kar rahe ho agar main baat karu aapka just ek minute de dijiye main aapko bata bhi deti hu aapka mostly leads ka pattern kya hai. Just one minute. Consumption by leads. Haan mostly aap jo leads uthate ho woh four to 24 hours mein uthate ho. Koshish ye kariye jyada se jyada recent leads ka consumption kariye jitna jyada aap recent leads ko uthaoge utna aapka business jyada hoga.
Customer: Haan. Theek hai mam. Yes. Dusri baat main aapse ek cheez aur discuss karungi I really appreciated you sir ki aap jyada se jyada buyer call pick bhi kar rahe ho response bhi kar rahe ho aapka reply rate bhi bahut achcha hai but mujhe ek cheez aur aapse discuss karni hai jaise cattle feed mein aap deal kar rahe ho cattle feed aapka main product hai to cattle feed ko hum cattle feed supplement bhi aata hai buffalo feed bhi aata hai aur bhi kai categories aati hai to kya hum un categories ko bhi add kar sakte hain?
Customer: Nahi mam.
Executive: Bataye. Haan ji. Hello. Haan. Sir aapko meri voice aa rahi hai kya?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was receiving irrelevant leads.

- Executive wants to add cattle feed category.

- Customer wants to deal locally.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested consuming recent leads.

- Executive suggested connecting on WhatsApp for bulk leads.

- Executive suggested focusing on clients with detailed profiles.

- Executive suggested adding cattle feed supplements.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, cattle feed, local preference, product catalog, maturity
